app_description: A digital library where you meet books anytime, anywhere

dialog__message__exit_message: Press 'Back' button once more to exit the app.

min_update.message:
The latest update is ready.
Experience the improved Coui eBook app.

blocked.title: App Unavailable
blocked.message:
The current version of the app is either unsafe or no longer supported.
For your security, please update to the latest version.

latest_update.title: Notice
latest_update.message:
The latest update is ready.
Experience the improved Coui eBook app.

no_internet_connection.title: Internet Connection Error
no_internet_connection.message: The internet connection is lost. Please check your network settings and try again.

marketing.title: Would you like to receive book recommendation notifications?
marketing.message: By opting in, you can receive notifications about new books, personalized recommendations, events, and various reading information.

received by email.
page_state.confirm_password_reset:

login.title: Sign In
login.tagline: Your smart companion on the knowledge journey
login.validation_password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters

home.text_field_hint__search: Search by book title, author, or publisher.

my_page.title: MY
my_page.charge_validity: Charged cash is valid for 5 years from the date of charge.
my_page.charge_price: Cash amount is the price excluding VAT.
my_page.charge_error: If cash is not charged properly, please restart the app or contact customer service

sample_book_request.title: Sample Book Request History
sample_book_request.guide_1: You can apply for a sample book by clicking the 'Request Sample Book' button at the bottom of the book information page in the store.
sample_book_request.guide_2: The requested book will be provided in E-BOOK format after approval by the publisher.
sample_book_request.guide_3: Sample books are provided as a reference for class preparation.
sample_book_request.rejection_reason_title: Reason for Sample Book Request Rejection

search.error_occurred: An error occurred while loading the content

representative_image.file_too_large: File size must be 10MB or less.
representative_image.pick_error: An error occurred while selecting image.

image_status.default_text: Please attach a representative photo for the chat room. (Optional/Maximum 1 file)
image_status.upload_complete: Image upload complete! Click to change to a different image.
image_status.existing_image: An existing representative image is set. Click to change.

form.chat_room_name_hint: Please enter the chat room name

validity_period.title: Validity Period
validity_period.description: (If no validity period is entered, it will be applied without restrictions.)

invite_link.title: Invite Link
invite_link.description: (Users who receive the invite link can request to join the class chat room through that link.)
invite_link.success_message: Invite link has been copied to clipboard!
invite_link.create_mode_message: Can be copied after creating the chat room

page.create_success: Class chat room has been successfully created!
page.update_success: Class chat room has been successfully updated!

card_notification.title: Reading Activity Notifications
card_notification.body: You can receive information about reading records, comments, and reading club activities.

card_event.title: Book News Notifications
card_event.body: Be the first to receive various reading news like new books, personalized recommendations, and events.

marketing.title: Book Notification {agree} Guide
marketing.location: You can change it in My Page > Settings.

alert.title: Notice
alert.contents: You will not receive various reading news like new books, personalized recommendations, and events. Do you still want to disable notifications?

withdraw.title: Withdraw
withdraw.check_title: Please make sure to check the following.
withdraw.check_list_01: All subscriptions and owned eBook content will be deleted and cannot be recovered.
withdraw.check_list_02: You cannot use the Coui eBook Reading Clubs service.
withdraw.check_list_03: Reviews and comments you've written may still remain.
withdraw.check_list_04: You cannot log in with this account again.
withdraw.agree: I have reviewed all the information provided and agree to it.

alert.title: Notice
alert.contents: The withdrawal has been completed. Thank you for using our service.

bookList.title: Book List
bookList.delete_confirmation_single_message:
Are you sure you want to delete {title}?
Deleted books cannot be recovered.
bookList.delete_confirmation_multiple_message:
Are you sure you want to delete {count} books?
Deleted books cannot be recovered.
bookList.delete_success_multiple_completed: Selected books have been successfully deleted.
bookList.error_message: An error occurred while loading the content

file.cover_image_format_guide: PNG, JPG formats available | Recommended resolution: 336 x 502

image.guideline_text: Recommended resolution: 1200x630 / PNG format / Maximum 5 files

toggle.drm_notice: * DRM is only applied to EPUB files.

validation.price_invalid: Please enter a valid price (greater than 0)

file_upload.capacity_exceeded: Capacity exceeded. The maximum uploadable capacity is {maxSize}MB.
file_upload.picker_already_running: Image picker is already running. Please try again later.
file_upload.gallery_permission_required: Gallery access permission is required. Please allow permission in settings.
file_upload.image_selection_error: An error occurred while selecting an image: {error}
file_upload.upload_info_unavailable: Uploaded file information is not available.
file_upload.upload_timeout: File upload timed out. The file size may be too large or the network connection may be unstable.
file_upload.multi_upload_timeout: Multiple image upload timed out. The file size may be too large or the network connection may be unstable.

dialog.exit_message: The input will not be saved.
dialog.image_upload_failed_message:
The selected image cannot be uploaded.

something_wrong.title: Something went wrong!
something_wrong.description: Rest assured, our team is investigating the issue and will resolve it as soon as possible. We are doing our best to ensure you can enjoy your reading!
